item.title: Tidytuesday: A weekly social data project in R
item.description: R is great because of not only it has a huge power inside its heart, but also it has a nice community in its ecosystem that helps individuals to learn and improve. One the greatest communities is #TidyTuesday. If you follow this hashtag on Twitter you will see lots of tweets about data visualization and more that you can learn from them. TidyTuesday’s Github page is the landing page of the community.

item.title: About Bahman Ajdari
item.description: I am a business administration graduate equipped with IT skills and data understanding. I help businesses to fully understand their environment and use information as a competitive advantage. I raise questions and find data oriented ways to solve them. I am always learning and prepared to tackle new challenges.
